name: exp18-kysely-implementation
description: Implementation task on Kysely (471 files) to test sidecar + skill + MCP

tasks.name: Implement DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS
tasks.prompt: Implement support for DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS in the ALTER TABLE builder. The Kysely query builder currently supports dropping columns, but doesn't support the IF EXISTS modifier. Add an `ifExists()` modifier that can be chained after `dropColumn()` in the alter table builder. This should generate SQL like: ALTER TABLE foo DROP COLUMN IF EXISTS bar. Look at how existing ALTER TABLE operations are implemented and follow the same patterns.
